meanings.definition: A blog in which the postings are primarily in video form.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy watching my favorite vloggers share their daily lives through videos.
meanings.sent2: Her vlog about travel adventures has gained a lot of followers.
meanings.sent3: The vlog showing a cat trying to play the piano was hilarious.
meanings.sent4: His vlog is like a window into his world, allowing us to see things from his perspective.
meanings.sent5: The vlog of the baby's first steps captured the precious moment beautifully.

meanings.definition: To create or post video content on a blog.
meanings.sent1: She plans to vlog about her cooking experiments on her blog.
meanings.sent2: They vlog regularly to keep their audience engaged.
meanings.sent3: He decided to vlog his attempt at learning a new dance routine.
meanings.sent4: Vlogging about nature allows you to share the beauty of the outdoors with others.
meanings.sent5: I will vlog the process of building a birdhouse to document each step.
